treatment.description: Mycoplasma capricolum subsp. capricolum subsp. nov. Mycoplasma capricolum subsp. capricolum (cap. ri. co'lum. L. gen. n. Capri, of a goat; L. v. incolere, to dwell; L. part. adj. capricolum, dwelling in a goat). The taxonomic Text of M. capricolum subsp. capricolum is the same as the Text of M. capricolum, except that members of this subspecies exhibit strong serological cross-reactivity with members of the newly designated taxon M. capricolum subsp. capripneumoniae; otherwise, M. capricolum subsp. capricolum is serologically distinguishable from previously described Mycoplasma species. The type strain is strain California kid (= ATCC 27343 = NCTC 10154); this is the type strain of both M. capricolum and M. capricolum subsp. capricolum.
